subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 digital recorder capture EVP over another
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_00BD_01C9F4A4.41344BD0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Evidence that his EVP was a True EVP. Evidence that he indeed captured some=
thing paranormal in nature.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: thread=
sintyme@... 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, June 24=
, 2009 8:13 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 digital recorder capture=
 EVP over another





  Evidence of what? 
  Al
  ---------- Original Mess=
age ----------
  From: "April Abercrombie" <april@abercrombieghostresearch.=
com>
  To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 di=
gital recorder capture EVP over another
  Date: Wed, 24 Jun 2009 07:50:03 -=
0600




  I would call that pretty good evidence right there.

    ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
    From: Zack Widup 
    To: EVP-ITC@...=
m 
    Sent: Wednesday, June 24, 2009 7:46 AM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Wh=
y does 1 digital recorder capture EVP over another



    Interesting topic=
!

    BTW that investigation was at the former Manteno State Mental Hospit=
al. It included the amazing "It's Harold Wing" EVP I got. None of the peopl=
e doing the investigation there had ever heard of Harold Wing. Upon later e=
xamination of old records, it was found that Harold Wing was actually a pat=
ient who died there of typhoid fever in 1938. But we didn't find that out u=
ntil weeks later.

    How do you explain that conventionally?
    :-)

   =
 Zack

     
    On Wed, Jun 24, 2009 at 8:36 AM, April Abercrombie <april@=
abercrombieghostresearch.com> wrote:





      A similar thing happened to=
 me on our last investigation too.

        ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
       From: Zack Widup 
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent:=
 Wednesday, June 24, 2009 7:19 AM
        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1=
 digital recorder capture EVP over another



        There's another possi=
bility: possibly the spirits involved only wish to impart sounds to a parti=
cular unit or units.

        I was surprised on one investigation I was on=
 to get mostly all the same EVP on my DVR, which was hanging from my belt, =
and my camcorder, which was in front of my face. Other people on the invest=
igation didn't get them at all. Go figure! 
        :-)

        Zack


   =
     On Tue, Jun 23, 2009 at 3:26 PM, Rj <rasterer@...> wrote:




  =
              There could be several reasons, and it's only conjecture with=
out comparing the two specific units in questions.  But some ideas:

      =
          1) The battery level on one is different than the other, and caus=
ing one to function less optimally and introduce noise or artifacts into th=
e stream.
                2) They were not actually 'sitting' side by side,=
 but being swung around.
                3) They are pointed at different a=
reas
                4) One may be older than the other or have been droppe=
d a few times.
                5) One may have been recently exposed to ext=
reme humidity or temperatures, while the other remained in a comfortable en=
vironment, before doing this recording
                6) One may be sittin=
g in a position more subject by airflow or vibrations
                7) Th=
ey may use different memory cards. that have different error or accuracy pr=
ofiles
                8) The final sound files may have been processed dif=
ferently in various software programs
                9) People in the room=
 may be nearer and moving closer to one than the other
                10) =
They may simply be two different models with different recording sensitives=
 and limitations



                --- On Tue, 6/23/09, lechevar2000 <lech=
evar@...> wrote:


                  From: lechevar2000 <lechevar@v=
erizon.net>
                  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 digital recorde=
r capture EVP over another
                  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  =
                Date: Tuesday, June 23, 2009, 5:57 AM 



                 =
 Hi, 
                  I believe I saw an explaination on this list about =
why if you have 2 recorders sitting side by side, why may one capture an EV=
P on one and not the other? Someone was explaining about an energy field li=
ke a bubble. 
                  I'm trying to explain this theory to a frie=
nd. Can someone help me? 
                  Thanks Laura


               
=
















  _________________________________________________________=
___ 
  Workers Compensation Legal Advice. Click here
